languages.text: "Это хорошая случайность. Денз был бы рад так{mf|ому|ой} гост{mf|ю|ье} на своих похоронах".
"Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."
languages.original_text: "Это хорошая случайность. Денз был бы рад так{mf|ому|ой} гост{mf|ю|ье} на своих похоронах".

traits.locale_text: "Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would enjoy having such a guest at his funeral."
"Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would enjoy having such a guest at his funeral."
"Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."
"Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."
"Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."

languages.text: “那我猜这预示着好运。如果丹兹泉下有知，他一定很高兴能有你这样的人参加他的葬礼。”
languages.original_text: "Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."

traits.locale_text: “那我猜这预示着好运。如果丹兹泉下有知，他一定很高兴能有你这样的人参加他的葬礼。”

languages.text: «Entonces consideraré esto como un golpe de suerte. A Denz le encantaría saber que alguien de su categoría ha asistido a su funeral».
languages.original_text: "Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces consideraré esto como un golpe de suerte. A Denz le encantaría saber que alguien de su categoría ha asistido a su funeral».

languages.text: 「では、気まぐれな幸運としておきましょう。あなたのような方が葬式に参列してくれて、デンツも喜んでいると思います」
languages.original_text: "Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."

traits.locale_text: 「では、気まぐれな幸運としておきましょう。あなたのような方が葬式に参列してくれて、デンツも喜んでいると思います」

languages.text: "Dann werde ich das glückliches Geschick betrachten. Denz wäre begeistert, jemanden Eures Standes bei seiner Bestattung zu wissen."
languages.original_text: "Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werde ich das glückliches Geschick betrachten. Denz wäre begeistert, jemanden Eures Standes bei seiner Bestattung zu wissen."

languages.text: « Et quel heureux hasard ! Denz serait ravi que quelqu'un de votre envergure assiste à ses funérailles. »
languages.original_text: "Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."

traits.locale_text: « Et quel heureux hasard ! Denz serait ravi que quelqu'un de votre envergure assiste à ses funérailles. »

languages.text: "Şans yüzümüze güldü o vakit. Denz, cenazesine böylesine saygın birinin katılacağını bilse hayli memnun olurdu."
languages.original_text: "Then I will consider this a stroke of good luck. Denz would be chuffed to have someone of your standing at his funeral."

traits.locale_text: "Şans yüzümüze güldü o vakit. Denz, cenazesine sizin gibi saygın birinin katıldığını bilse hayli memnun olurdu."
